rules_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Decompose into Clue {2}{G} [i]({2}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Clue artifact with no mana cost and “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Baker’s Widow

Green had a lot of 4MV cards at uncommon, and Widow was the most generic of those cards, and I wanted to open the way for multiple Ooze cards at uncommon in green.
